item.description:
We are going to go to a local bar in the financial district 'The Vault', then head over to the Vintage Lounge. This gonna give everyone an opportunity to meet people in a low key environment before heading over to the Vintage Lounge for a night of fun.

Location 1: Time: 9.00 PM-10:30 PM
The Vault (in the financial district)
105 Walter Street
Boston MA
617-292-3355
http://www.thevaultbo... (go to for directions)

We will meet at this place and socialize for a bit. (If someone you want to skip this part and go directly to Vintage Lounge at 10.30, that is fine)

Location 2: Time 10:30 PM-2:00AM
Vintage Lounge (in the financial district)
72 Broad Street
Boston MA 02110
http://www.vlboston.c... (go there for directions)

We will get the Vintage Lounge at 10.30 PM. Note: There is a 10 dollar entry fee for members of this meetup and there friends, so please rvsp and email highrollerbostongroup@gmail.com, if you want your friends on the guestlist, other wise the cover is 15 dollars.

If you guys have any questions you can reach me at 9787617304. Below I attached the official description of the vintage lounge event.

Parag

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BOSTON!! ARE YOU READY ??

Vintage Lounge - Envy Saturdays presents..

A Live Fashion Show & YOU ARE INVITED !!

ALL THE WAY FROM LA!! EXPERINCE..

RIA FASHIONS ALL NEW Swim Suit and Club Wear Collection!!

RIA FASHIONS - European Styles of Fashion in Boston!!

About the Designer: RIA FASHION has been -

- Showcased in the Tori Spelling Charity Event.
- Personal Stylist Assistant to Don Ed Hardy (LA)

G E T R E A D Y...

Two Rooms of Music and Non Stop Entertainment..
Entertainment/Music by

Stanley : Bostons Number 1 Club Percussionist/Entertainer!!
Room 1 : Dj Big (Hip Hop, Top 40, Mashups , House)
Room 2 : Dj HUGO X (International, Latin, Greek, Arabic, Bhangra)

Location: Vintage Lounge (71 Broad Street)
Near Umbria and right in front of the Hilton Hotel.
Cost: $10 on GL
This is a 21+ event.

Make sure to get your cameras for this special event!!!

FOR VIP TABLES or GUESTLIST CONTACT RAVI AT 617.416.8705 or Email: HighRollerBoston@gmail.com

Official Site: http://www.HighRoller...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a grey suit jacket and jeans. My picture is also next to my profile.
item.why: Guys this is gonna be a big event. It gonna be a great event to meet people not only from this meetup group but also outside of this group.
item.name: MEET AND GREET MIXER
